languages.text: Вольный Торговец может даровать каторжанам право выкупить свободу рожденных в неволе детей своим трудом.
The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец может даровать каторжанам право выкупить свободу рожденных в неволе детей своим трудом.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy the freedom of their children born in captivity with their labour.
The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy the freedom of their children born in captivity with their labour.
The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.

The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} peut accorder aux condamnés le droit d'acheter par leur travail la liberté de leurs enfants nés en captivité.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} peut accorder aux condamnés le droit d'acheter par leur travail la liberté de leurs enfants nés en captivité.

languages.text: 自由開拓者は、囚人に、その労働で囚われの身として生まれた子供の自由を買い取る権利を与えることができる。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は、囚人に、その労働で囚われの身として生まれた子供の自由を買い取る権利を与えることができる。

languages.text: 行商浪人允许犯人通过劳动，让他们诞生在监狱中的孩子获得自由。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人允许犯人通过劳动，让他们诞生在监狱中的孩子获得自由。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente puede conceder a los convictos el derecho a comprar con su trabajo la libertad de sus hijos nacidos en cautividad.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente puede conceder a los convictos el derecho a comprar con su trabajo la libertad de sus hijos nacidos en cautividad.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} kann den Sträflingen das Recht gewähren, mit ihrer Arbeitskraft die Freiheit ihrer in Gefangenschaft geborenen Kinder zu erkaufen.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} kann den Sträflingen das Recht gewähren, mit ihrer Arbeitskraft die Freiheit ihrer in Gefangenschaft geborenen Kinder zu erkaufen.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, mahkûmlara; tutsaklıkları sırasında doğan çocuklarının hürriyetini çalışarak kazanma şansı tanıyabilir.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader may grant the convicts the right to buy, with their labour, the freedom of their children born in captivity.
